content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  November 17 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB-' rating to Torchmark Corporation's (TMK) issuance of $125 million of junior subordinated debentures due 2057. The rating being assigned to the new debt is equivalent to the ratings assigned to TMK's existing junior subordinated debentures and reflects standard notching for a hybrid with its risk characteristics. Based on Fitch's rating criteria  the securities are notched u
name: Torchmark Corporation
title: Fitch Assigns 'BBB-' Rating to Torchmark's Junior Subordinated Debentures

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  November 16 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Torchmark Corporation's (TMK) Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'A-' and the Insurer Financial Strength (IFS) ratings for TMK's insurance subsidiaries at 'A+'. The Rating Outlook is Stable. A complete list of rating actions follows at the end of this release. KEY RATING DRIVERS Today's rating actions reflect TMK's very strong and stable operating profitability  strong competitive posi
name: Torchmark Corporation
title: Fitch Affirms Torchmark's Ratings; Outlook Stable
